name: +1000 Social Credits
description:
Original version made in 3 days, don't blame me I was drunk while I made that game and this is the first game I made in 2d, I'm usually better in vr or 3d

I'm gonna update that game more so check out this site to see if I updated the game, there are some bugs like sometimes the spawn script just gives up and no more trumps would spawn :(

What is planned for future updates:

(Player prefs)High-score that is saved after you restarted or exited

Some bug fixing and more advanced UI(Button for if your stuck or other things)

Multiplayer?(I'm properly not bc photon sucks)

pls write any bugs in the Discussion board

Would be funny if this game would make it into a qzeq Video lol
